4257.verse: وَمِنْ|And among|93|103|1133$ءَايَـٰتِهِۦٓ|His Signs|87|106|706$أَنَّكَ|(is) that you|104|124|9862$تَرَى|see|64|84|5175$ٱلْأَرْضَ|the earth|92|112|197$خَـٰشِعَةً|barren,|86|106|15306$فَإِذَآ|but when|82|92|1730$أَنزَلْنَا|We send down|117|133|929$عَلَيْهَا|upon it|69|102|1269$ٱلْمَآءَ|water|67|100|6476$ٱهْتَزَّتْ|it is stirred (to life)|146|179|11980$وَرَبَتْ‌ۚ|and grows.|93|126|11981$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|86|58$ٱلَّذِىٓ|the One Who|107|122|138$أَحْيَاهَا|gives it life,|97|127|4928$لَمُحْىِ|(is) surely the Giver of life|193|223|13767$ٱلْمَوْتَىٰٓ‌ۚ|(to) the dead.|115|145|704$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He|92|107|396$عَلَىٰ|(is) on|63|127|52$كُلِّ|every|57|185|185$شَىْءٍ|thing|69|197|186$قَدِيرٌ|All-Powerful.|103|167|187$

4259.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|87|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|122|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve|84|117|59$بِٱلذِّكْرِ|in the Reminder|122|155|15308$لَمَّا|when|55|88|3471$جَآءَهُمْ‌ۖ|it comes to them.|138|155|853$وَإِنَّهُۥ|And indeed, it|112|200|1195$لَكِتَـٰبٌ|(is) surely a Book|135|310|15309$عَزِيزٌ|mighty.|77|165|1827$

4261.verse: مَّا|Not|43|51|262$يُقَالُ|is said|61|77|15313$لَكَ|to you|63|79|323$إِلَّا|except|65|81|86$مَا|what|53|69|262$قَدْ قِيلَ|was said|82|98|15314$لِلرُّسُلِ|to the Messengers|143|159|15315$مِن قَبْلِكَ‌ۚ|before you.|102|110|47$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|82|58$رَبَّكَ|your Lord|82|106|586$لَذُو|(is) Possessor|112|136|9155$مَغْفِرَةٍ|(of) forgiveness,|130|154|3274$وَذُو|and Possessor|114|138|15316$عِقَابٍ|(of) penalty|99|111|15317$أَلِيمٍ|painful.|68|68|2718$

4262.verse: وَلَوْ|And if|58|69|179$جَعَلْنَـٰهُ|We (had) made it|136|158|5440$قُرْءَانًا|a Quran|80|102|9459$أَعْجَمِيًّا|(in) a foreign (language),|187|208|15318$لَّقَالُواْ|they (would have) said,|178|189|9723$لَوْلَا|`Why not|84|93|1090$فُصِّلَتْ|are explained in detail|164|182|8355$ءَايَـٰتُهُۥٓ‌ۖ|its verses?|91|110|7132$ءَا۠عْجَمِىٌّ۬|(Is it) a foreign (language)|197|216|15319$وَعَرَبِىٌّ‌ۗ|and an Arab?`|115|124|15320$قُلْ|Say,|50|57|765$هُوَ|`It (is)|66|80|298$لِلَّذِينَ|for those who|112|126|750$ءَامَنُواْ|believe,|82|96|84$هُدًى|a guidance|92|106|33$وَشِفَآءٌ‌ۖ|and a healing.`|121|135|8196$وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|126|42$لَا|(do) not|75|87|30$يُؤْمِنُونَ|believe,|94|118|35$فِىٓ|in|48|72|89$ءَاذَانِهِمْ|their ears|90|114|163$وَقْرٌ|(is) deafness,|111|135|15221$وَهُوَ|and it|62|86|305$عَلَيْهِمْ|(is) for them|103|115|22$عَمًى‌ۚ|blindness.|85|105|15321$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those|82|123|51$يُنَادَوْنَ|are being called|124|165|15082$مِن|from|50|91|53$مَّكَانِۭ|a place|70|111|8082$بَعِيدٍ|far.`|60|80|1514$

4263.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly,|112|127|640$ءَاتَيْنَا|We gave|78|109|509$مُوسَى|Musa|83|114|499$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Book,|85|116|451$فَٱخْتُلِفَ|but disputes arose|143|174|8760$فِيهِ‌ۗ|therein.|71|86|32$وَلَوْلَا|And had it not been|152|180|2238$كَلِمَةٌ|(for) a word|100|156|8063$سَبَقَتْ|that preceded|114|170|8064$مِن|from|50|106|53$رَّبِّكَ|your Lord,|87|115|1322$لَقُضِىَ|surely, would have been settled|232|241|5438$بَيْنَهُمْ‌ۚ|between them.|120|138|1056$وَإِنَّهُمْ|But indeed, they|130|148|5517$لَفِى|surely (are) in|113|131|1513$شَكٍّ|doubt|58|67|4619$مِّنْهُ|about it|72|326|571$مُرِيبٍ|disquieting.|95|349|8582$

4264.verse: مَّنْ|Whoever|78|89|76$عَمِلَ|does|66|87|10138$صَـٰلِحًا|righteous deeds|125|146|622$فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ‌ۖ|then it is for his soul;|162|183|5915$وَمَنْ|and whoever|105|126|1012$أَسَآءَ|does evil,|83|94|15322$فَعَلَيْهَا‌ۗ|then it is against it.|151|171|5917$وَمَا|And not|72|112|46$رَبُّكَ|(is) your Lord|109|150|310$بِظَلَّـٰمٍ|unjust|72|112|3561$لِّلْعَبِيدِ|to His slaves.|109|129|3562$

4257.verse: And of His signs is that you see the earth stilled, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and grows. Indeed, He who has given it life is the Giver of Life to the dead. Indeed, He is over all things competent.

4258.verse: Indeed, those who inject deviation into Our verses are not concealed from Us. So, is he who is cast into the Fire better or he who comes secure on the Day of Resurrection? Do whatever you will; indeed, He is Seeing of what you do.

4259.verse: Indeed, those who disbelieve in the message after it has come to them... And indeed, it is a mighty Book.

4260.verse: Falsehood cannot approach it from before it or from behind it; [it is] a revelation from a [Lord who is] Wise and Praiseworthy.

4261.verse: Nothing is said to you, [O Muhammad], except what was already said to the messengers before you. Indeed, your Lord is a possessor of forgiveness and a possessor of painful penalty.

4262.verse: And if We had made it a non-Arabic Qur'an, they would have said, "Why are its verses not explained in detail [in our language]? Is it a foreign [recitation] and an Arab [messenger]?" Say, "It is, for those who believe, a guidance and cure." And those who do not believe - in their ears is deafness, and it is upon them blindness. Those are being called from a distant place.

4263.verse: And We had already given Moses the Scripture, but it came under disagreement. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed they are, concerning the Qur'an, in disquieting doubt.

4264.verse: Whoever does righteousness - it is for his [own] soul; and whoever does evil [does so] against it. And your Lord is not ever unjust to [His] servants.
